entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this morning. High 16. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Periods of rain beginning before morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low 8. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 28 April 2023
